beer.beer_name: Strawberry Creaming Soda Ice Cream Sour
beer.beer_description: Dripping with juicy flavours and aromas of ripe strawberry, creaming soda and smooth vanilla, this beer reminds us of a simpler time. There's a decadent ice-cream-like character from lactose that helps to balance the refreshingly tart finish.

items.badge_description: Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 190 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 39.
It’s been a long day and now it’s time for a reward. Crisp, tasty and refreshing, enjoy that delicious fruit beer! That's 125 different fruited beers. Try 5 more for Level 26!

items.badge_description: It’s been a long day and now it’s time for a reward. Crisp, tasty and refreshing, enjoy that delicious fruit beer! That's 145 different fruited beers. Try 5 more for Level 30!

Marshmallow, chocolate, apple pie! Cakes and cookies catch my eye. Churn that butter, twist and shout. Put it in a pastry stout! That’s  5 different beers with the style of Stout - Pastry, Stout - Imperial / Double Pastry, or Sour - Smoothie / Pastry. Check-in to 5 more to get to Level 2.

items.badge_description: Celebrate women and non-binary individuals in craft beer! Every year the Pink Boots Society (PBS) hosts Collaboration Brew Day where teams come together to brew a collab beer that supports the PBS mission to support, inspire, and encourage the professional development of women and non-binary people in the industry. Learn more

items.checkin_comment:
It's creamy, lactose, sour and then into sweet with a vanilla hint. Not necessarily  my taste but it is definitely tasting like it was named after
BCAC2023

user.bio:
Rating:
0-1:disappointing
1-2:below average
2-3:tastes as it is should
3-4:tasty,drink it again
4-5:buy again immediatel
